mapper.select: select r.* from t_role r, t_user_role ur where r.id = ur.roleId and ur.userId = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user(id, userName, password, fullName, email, weichat, modifydate, status) values(#{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{fullName}, #{email}, #{weichat}, sysdate(), '1')
mapper.update: update t_user set userName = #{userName}, password = #{password}, fullName = #{fullName}, email = #{email}, weichat = #{weichat}, modifydate = sysdate() where id = #{id}

update t_user set fullName = #{fullName}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, workNo = #{workNo}, dept = #{dept}, position = #{position}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, QQ = #{QQ}, weichat = #{weichat}, head = #{head}, remark = #{remark}, modifydate = sysdate() where id = #{id}
update t_user set status = '0', modifydate = sysdate() where id = #{id}
